long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiipu is a tool designed to help you efficiently save and manage bookmarks. It arranges each webpage into a card format and offers various display options for different types of web content, enabling you to easily retrieve and organize bookmarks with a single glance.

Additionally, it supports cross-platform functionality, allowing you to access your bookmarks anytime, anywhere, whether on a computer or mobile phone 👀.

If you're someone who loves collecting bookmarks and enjoys saving intriguing or useful webpages in your browser, then this tool is definitely worth a try 🌟~
long.zh_CN:
奇普书签，是一款能够帮你快速收藏和方便管理书签的工具。它将每一个网页都结构化成卡片的形式，针对不同类型的网页提供了不同的展现形式，让你在一目了然中快速检索和整理书签。
而且它还支持全平台使用，无论是在电脑上还是手机上，都可以随时随地查看书签 👀

如果你是一个收藏控 🌟，喜欢在浏览器里收藏各种感兴趣或有用的网页，那么这款工具绝对值得你尝试！
